article.title: Pittsburgh U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Pittsburgh U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Center in Pittsburgh

1000 Liberty Avenue, Suite 807
Pittsburgh, PA 15222
Phone: 412-644-2800
Fax: 412-644-2803
Email:Office.Pittsburgh@trade.gov

**Our Trade Specialists are assigned according to industry sector. If your industry sector is not listed, please contact Lyn Doverspike.**

Lyn Doverspike,Director
Industry Focus:Consumer & Home Goods; Franchising; Iron & Steel.
Email:Lyn.Doverspike@trade.gov
Phone:412-644-2820

Steven Murray,Senior International Trade Specialist
Industry Focus:Aerospace & Defence; Agribusiness; Architectural, Building, Construction, Engineering Equipment, Products, and Services; Food Processing & Packaging Equipment; Information & Communication Technology related Services, Equipment, and Products; Lumber and Hardwoods; Safety & Security Products.
Email:Steven.Murray@trade.gov
Phone:412-644-2819

LeeAnne Haworth
Industry Focus:Apparel, Footwear & Textiles; Educational & Training Services; Healthcare & Medical Technology and Products; Laboratory & Scientific Instruments; Publishing, Media, and Entertainment; Services, Sporting Goods & Recreation Equipment; Services (Advertising, Legal, and Management Consulting) Travel and Tourism; Veterinary Equipment & Supplies.
Email:LeeAnne.Haworth@trade.gov
Phone: 412-644-2816

Ryan Russell, Senior International Trade Specialist
Industry Focus:Automotive & Ground Transportation; Environmental Technologies, Chemicals & Composites; Energy & Mining, Industrial Equipment & Supplies; Machine Tools & Metalworking Equipment, Powdered Metals
Email:Ryan.Russell@trade.gov
Phone:412-644-2817

Counties Covered:Allegheny, Armstrong, Beaver, Bedford, Blair, Butler, Cambria, Cameron, Clarion, Centre, Clearfield, Clinton, Crawford, Elk, Erie, Fayette, Forest, Fulton, Green, Huntingdon, Indiana, Jefferson, Juniata, Lawrence, Mercer, McKean, Mifflin, Perry, Potter, Somerset, Snyder, Union, Venango, Warren, Washington, and Westmoreland.​
